https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/dsJy7snOcbxbwY1VcHS5mpXUINo.jpg Banglavil Outha is a 2005 Malayalam movie directed by Santhivila Dinesh starring Lal, Jagathy Sreekumar, Sajan Surya, Kalpana, and Bhavana. The movie is produced by Sukumaran and the music composed by Jayachandran M. Banglavil Outha
